entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: The village where Harry and his friends are located. ("What were they going to do if the great black dog came bounding up the street toward them in Hogsmeade...")

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather who is on the run from Voldemort. ("he still worried from time to time that Sirius might throw caution to the winds and turn up anyway.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. ("Harry knew they had made him angry by saying that they did not want him to come...")

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is a rival of Harry's. ("perhaps under the nose of Draco Malfoy...")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's best friend. ("said Ron, when Harry discussed his fears with him and Hermione.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other best friend. ("Hermione scowled at Ron...")

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: An elf who is being kept by the Malfoy family. ("but otherwise ignored the slight on Kreacher.")

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story. ("until V-Voldemort — oh for heaven’s sake, Ron — comes out into the open...")

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Sirius's safety. ("he still worried from time to time that Sirius might throw caution to the winds and turn up anyway.")
Ron is friends with Harry. ("said Ron, when Harry discussed his fears with him and Hermione.")
Hermione dislikes Kreacher. ("but otherwise ignored the slight on Kreacher.")
Voldemort is a threat to Sirius's safety. ("until V-Voldemort — oh for heaven’s sake, Ron — comes out into the open...")
